Translation.line1: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
Translation.line2: Praise be to Allah, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds;
Translation.line4: Master of the Day of Judgment.
Translation.line5: Thee do we worship, and Thine aid we seek.
Translation.line7: The way of those on whom Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace,
Translation.line8: those whose (portion) is not wrath, and who go not astray.
